entry.title: Turmeric Broad Spectrum Sunscreen SPF 30
entry.summary:
Vendor: VIVAIODAYS
Type: Baby
Price: 24.00

Easily Absorbed | Easy to Apply (soft texture) | Coral Reef Safe

0% Synthetics, with 20% Non-Nano Zinc Oxide and Turmeric, an antioxidant that protects from long-term damage caused by UV radiation.

Made with healing Organic Turmeric Oil & 20% uncoated Zinc Oxide, a super-safe & effective physical blocker, this essential sun protector shields delicate skin with strong antioxidant activity. Non-nano, UVA-UVB-IR broad-spectrum protection ideal for the entire family. Also features: Organic Sea Buckthorn Pulp Oil that helps naturally strengthen skin immunity. Organic Calendula & Shea Butter calm, hydrate and soothe delicate skin. Colorless & easy to apply from head to toe keep your little ones safe, sound & perfectly protected!

• Dermatologist-tested for sensitive skin

• Natural Ingredients, Certified COSMOS Organic, Non-GMO, Gluten-Free, Allergens-Free, Cruelty-Free

• Free From: Parabens, Propylene Glycol, Silicones, Petrochemicals, Ethanolamines, Synthetic Dyes, Alcohol, Phthalates, Wheat/Gluten, Synthetic Fragrance.

• 3.4 oz | 100 ml

Ingredients

SIMMONDSIA CHINENSIS (JOJOBA)SEED OIL*, ZINC OXIDE, HELIANTHUS ANNUUS (SUNFLOWER) SEED OIL*, CAPRYLIC/CAPRIC TRIGLYCERIDE, BUTYROSPERMUM PARKII (SHEA) BUTTER*, CERA ALBA/BEESWAX*, HYDROGENATED VEGETABLE OIL, GLYCERYL STEARATE, OLEA EUROPAEA (OLIVE) FRUIT OIL*, PARFUM, POLYHYDROXYSTEARIC ACID, HIPPOPHAE RHAMNOIDES (SEABUCKTHORN) FRUIT OIL*, TOCOPHEROL, CURCUMA LONGA (TURMERIC) ROOT EXTRACT*, CALENDULA OFFICINALIS (CALENDULA) FLOWER EXTRACT*.

ALLERGENS: NONE

*From organic farming.

100% ingredients of natural origin.

59.14% ingredients from organic farming**.

73.93% organic of total minus water and minerals.

**per COSMOS ORGANIC standard, water and minerals do not count on product organic content.

Directions

Non-Nano SPF 30 Broad Spectrum UVA-UVB-IR Protection is very Water-Resistant and ideal for the entire family. Apply liberally & evenly 15 min prior to sun exposure. Re-apply after 40 min of swimming or sweating & immediately after towel drying, or at least every 2 hours.

entry.title: Olive Oil All Purpose Rescue Balm Gel
entry.summary:
Vendor: VIVAIODAYS
Type: Face Balm
Price: 24.00

A Gentle, Skin-Saver (96.77% Organic) 2-in-1 For:

  • Diaper rash prevention
  • For nursing Moms as a nipple balm gel
  • Also great for chapped lips, rough rosy cheeks, & cradle cap

This ultra-nourishing balm-gel magically transforms into a super soothing cream on contact with skin’s own water content to bring instant relief to children’s skin & a parent’s mind! Formulated for face, lips & the delicate diaper area prone to dryness & irritation, this heroic skin-saver is boosted with Organic, Cold Pressed, Extra Virgin Olive Oil from Greece providing multiple skin benefits. Loaded with nutrients & antioxidants like Vitamin E, Organic Sunflower & Sweet Almond Oils elevate the formula’s soothing properties. Shields the skin with essential moisture & provides the mildest nutritional value due to little-to-no processing.

• Dermatologist-tested for sensitive skin

• Natural Ingredients, Vegan, Certified COSMOS Organic, Non-GMO, Gluten-Free, Allergens-Free, Cruelty-Free

Directions

For diaper rash prevention: apply a very small amount to diaper area once or twice a day after washing. As a nipple gel for nursing Moms: apply a very small amount before breastfeed. No need for rinsing. Great for chapped lips, rough rosy cheeks and cradle cap. Apply to clean skin a small amount of the balm-gel as often as needed. Avoid eye area.

entry.title: Lip Balm + Face Stick SPF 30
entry.summary:
Vendor: AKT Therapy
Type: Sunscreen
Price: 20.00

Sheer, multi-use Lip Balm and Face Stick provides broad spectrum UV protection, and works to nourish + hydrate skin.

This SPF 30 jumbo stick is 3x the size of a normal lip balm, and with its multi-tasking abilities, the only one you’ll need to throw in your bag!

Cocoa Butter is an antioxidant powerhouse, and is also rich in fatty acids, providing deep hydration. Soothing Calendula Flower Extract can help balance the appearance of redness, irritation, and inflammation from free radical damage. Zinc Oxide provides the safest broad spectrum SPF protection, and has natural anti-bacterial properties.

Nutrient-dense Avocado and Sea Buckthorn Oils are high in Vitamin E and antioxidants, keeping your cheeks and lips nourished in the sun.

• .56 oz | 17 g

Ingredients

Active Ingredients: ﻿non-nano Zinc Oxide (13%). Ingredients: *Calendula Officinalis (Calendula) Flower Extract, *Calophyllum Inophyllum (Tamanu) Oil, *Cera Flava (Beeswax), *Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, *Hippophae Rhamnoides (Sea Buckthorn) Oil, Natural Flavor, *Persea Gratissima (Avocado) Oil, *Ricinus Communis (Castor) Seed Oil, *Theobroma Cacao (Cocoa) Seed Butter, Mixed Tocopherols (Vitamin E). *Certified Organic Ingredients

Apply liberally 15 minutes prior to sun exposure.

entry.title: D-Luxe Daily Bronzer SPF 30
entry.summary:
Vendor: AKT Therapy
Type: Bronzer
Price: 28.00

Silky, lightweight D-Luxe Daily Bronzer protects skin from UV damage, while providing a healthy, natural bronze glow.

For a luminous foundation with a luxurious, barely-there finish, use this SPF 30 Daily Bronzer to nourish and protect your skin.

Extra Virgin Olive Oil delivers decadent softness and hydration. Zinc Oxide provides the safest broad spectrum SPF protection, has natural anti-bacterial properties, and may also help balance the appearance of redness, irritation, and inflammation from free radical damage.

And the best part? It’s fortified with essential Vitamin D. (Since sunscreens are designed to filter out the sun’s rays, they also block the UVB light that our body needs to make Vitamin D.) The body uses Vitamin D to maintain many aspects of its overall health, from bones and teeth to the brain and immune system.

• 1 oz | 30 g

Ingredients

Active Ingredients: non-nano Zinc Oxide (25%). Ingredients: Aqua (Water), *Olea Europaea (Extra Virgin Olive) Fruit Oil, *Cera Alba (Beeswax), ‡Tocopherol (Vegetable Vitamin E), Cholecalciferol (Vitamin D3), Iron Oxides (Iron Oxide). *Organic ‡Non-GMO

Directions

Apply liberally 15 minutes prior to sun exposure.

entry.title: Rad Face Oil
entry.summary:
Vendor: AKT Therapy
Type: Face Oil
Price: 82.00

Rad Face Oil revitalizes skin for a complexion that glows. Great for all skin types, but especially beneficial for sensitive, dry, or mature skin. Lightweight and insta-absorbing, this face oil is your everyday indulgence for a complexion that looks and feels nourished and restored. Wear alone, or under a favorite foundation.

Red Raspberry Seed Oil is known for its high antioxidant content, its moisturizing and anti-inflammatory effects, and its natural UV protection. A rich source of Omega-3 and Omega-6 essential fatty acids, Vitamin E, and carotenoids, it gives skin a boost to help reduce the appearance of damage from free radicals.

Avocado and Cactus Seed Oils soak skin in Vitamin K, which helps minimize the appearance of redness, wrinkles, and dark spots.

• 1 oz | 30 ml

Ingredients

*Calendula officinalis (calendula) flower extract, **Vitis vinifera (Grapeseed) oil, *Prunus cerasus (Cherry) kernel oil, **Persea americana (avocado) seed oil, *Opuntia ficus (cactus) seed oil, **Simmondsia (jojoba) oil, *Rubus idaeus (raspberry) seed oil, *Limnanthes alba (meadow foam) seed oil, **Helichrysum italicum. *Organic Agriculture **Wildcrafted

Directions

Use daily, either alone or in combination with the Elemental Sun Balm. Apply 1-3 drops to cleansed and toned skin as part of your morning and evening skincare regimen. Warm oil with fingertips, then press gently all over the face and neck. Allow to absorb for 2-3 minutes before applying makeup.

entry.title: Elemental Sun Balm SPF 30
entry.summary:
Vendor: AKT Therapy
Type: Sunscreen
Price: 48.00

Moisturizing, mineral-based Elemental Sun Balm provides nourishment and broad spectrum UV protection. With a natural tint that blends sheer, it’s truly the best of all worlds: a balm, a block, and a base.

Extra Virgin Coconut Oil locks in moisture, keeping skin plump and hydrated. It contains Vitamin E, essential amino acids, and lauric and caprylic acid, which form part of the natural barrier function of skin. Zinc Oxide provides the safest broad spectrum SPF protection, has natural anti-bacterial properties, and may also help reduce the appearance of redness, irritation, and inflammation. With a boost in antioxidants from Vanilla Extract, this luscious layer of protection will leave skin feeling refreshed and petal soft.

Skip a step by using Elemental Sun Balm instead of foundation as part of your daily beauty regimen.

• 1 oz | 30 ml

Ingredients

Active Ingredient: **Zinc Oxide USP 25%. Inactive Ingredients: *Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, *Cera Alba (Beeswax), *Vanilla Extract (Aqua (and) *Ethanol (and) *Vanilla Planifolia Fruit Extract), Iron Oxides. *Certified Organic by USDA/NOP, **Non-nano, Uncoated

Directions

Prep clean skin with 1-2 drops of Rad Daily Defense Face Oil. Apply a small amount of balm with fingertips and blend evenly into face, neck and decollete. Wear alone or as a primer to your foundation. Apply liberally 15 minutes before sun exposure.

entry.title: PlantGenius Survival Serum
entry.summary:
Vendor: Alpyn Beauty
Type: Facial Serum
Price: 68.00

This all-in-one brightening serum and illuminating primer delivers instant radiance, long-term glow, and all-day happiness.

The hydrating, antioxidant­-rich formula helps even tone with vitamin C, bearberry leaf and licorice root extract, while a trio of gentle exfoliants help refine skin's surface and promote cell turnover. Wild actives nourish with essential vitamins.

What's inside:

• Mica blurs imperfections and adds a soft-focus, airbrushed glow.

• Natural brighteners — bearberry leaf extract, licorice root extract, vitamin C—help reduce dark spots and hyperpigmentation over time.

• A trio of gentle exfoliants — azelaic, glycolic, and lactic acid— delicately exfoliate dead surface cells, promote cell turnover, and soothe skin.

• Sunflower seed oil — an anti-inflammatory, antioxidant superstar rich in vitamin E—protects skin against free radical damage.

• Tripeptide-29 encourages collagen production to plump skin and diminish the appearance of fine lines.

• Natural moisturizers — hyaluronic acid, olive fruit oil, linoleic acid, coconut, squalane—provide lightweight hydration.

Formulated WITHOUT:

• Parabens, Formaldehyde Donors, MEA/DEA/TEA, Palm Ingredients, Sulfates, Synthetic Dyes, Colors & Fragrance, Phthalates, Petrochemicals, PEG’s/ PPG’s, Metallic Aluminum, Triclosan, Talc, Mineral Oil, Petrolatum, Toluene, Fragrance Free, Gluten Free, Soy Free, Vegan

• 1.7 fl oz | 50 ml

Ingredients

Aloe Barbadensis (Aloe Vera) Leaf Juice*, Sodium Hyaluronate, Glycerin, Sodium Acrylates Copolymer, Squalane, Capryloyl Glycerin/Sebacic Acid Copolymer, Diheptyl Succinate, Mica, Hydrolyzed Lupine Protein, Lecithin, Titanium Dioxide, 3-0-Ethyl Ascorbic Acid, Zinc Oxide, Centella Asiatica Meri stem Cell Culture, Xanthan Gum, Dehydroacetic Acid, Benzyl Alcohol, Linoleic Acid, Azelaic Acid, Tripeptide-29, Potassium Sorbate, Hydrolyzed Sodium Hyaluronate, Lactic Acid, Glycolic Acid, Tin Oxide, Caesalpinia Sappan Bark Extract, Sodium Phytate, Tocopherol, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil*, Arctostaphylos Uva Ursi (Bearberry) Leaf Extract*, Water, Glycyrrhiza Gia bra (Licorice) Root Extract*, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Lavandula Angustifolia (Lavender) Oil, Citrus Aurantium Dulcis (Orange) Oil , Salvia Officinalis (Sage) Leaf Extract, Arn lea Montana (Arni ca) Flower Extract, Baraga Officinalis (Borage) Flower Extract, Calendula Officinalis (Calendula) Flower Extract, Chamomilla Recutita (Matricaria) Flower Extract. * Certified Organic

Smooth onto clean skin AM and PM. For added benefits, layer underneath PlantGenius Melt Moisturizer and dab on top of makeup for an even more radiant glow.

entry.title: Cell–Power Neck & Decolleté Cream
entry.summary:
Vendor: Medical Beauty Research
Type: neck treatment
Price: 195.00

“Smoothing Cell Activator”

A rich, intensely nourishing cream with a rejuvenating effect on the stem cells. An improved microcirculation enables the regeneration process. Cell-Power Neck & Decolleté Cream protects the skin against premature aging, such as UV ray induced damage. Nourishing components deeply hydrate the skin, increase the ability to retain moisture and improve the skin’s surface structure noticeably. The delicate skin of the neck and décolleté feels immediately firmed, smooth and supple.

• Rejuvenates stem cells

• Protects against UV ray induced cell DNA damage

• Improves microcirculation, enabling regeneration

• Balances moisture content and increases ability to retain moisture

• Smoothes and firms skin’s surface structure with a silky soft feel

- 100 ml | 3.4 oz

- *These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease.

Ingredients

Shea Butter, Olive Oil, Meadowfoam Oil, Crambe Abyssinian Oil, Argan Oil, Pentavitin®, Niacin (Vitamin B3), Phytosan, Tocopherol (Vitamin E), Hyaluronic Acid.

Directions

Use mornings and evenings after preparing the skin. Apply Cell-Power Neck & Decolleté Cream by gently massaging it in upward motions. For optimal results, apply after serum of your choice. Tip: For an intensive treatment, use as a mask twice a month or as desired. Apply Cell-Power Neck & Decolleté Cream evenly to the entire neck and décolleté and allow to penetrate for 10-15 minutes. Massage in the remaining mask in upward motions or remove with cosmetic tissue. For optimal results, use after serum of your choice.

entry.title: Liquid Surgery Serum
entry.summary:
Vendor: Medical Beauty Research
Type: Facial Serum
Price: 1750.00

“Pure Perfection”

A revolutionary serum that transforms the skin, revealing an exceptional perfect complexion. Only found in Liquid Surgery Serum®, a synergistic ingredient system based on a medical synthetic oxygen carrier is used as a hemoglobin substitute and replaces excess carbon dioxide with essential, pure oxygen. This remarkable process allows for a complete rejuvenation of the cell metabolism. Combined with the multitude of highly concentrated ingredients, this state-of-the-art treatment delivers significant, sustainable and measurable skin care results, revealing a youthful, flawless complexion. Neuromuscular blocking compounds reduce microcontractions, resulting in a dramatic reduction of wrinkles and creases. Strengthened collagen fibers prevent further sagging of the skin and wrinkle formation. Colloidal gold allow for an optimal penetration of precious ingredients.

• Increases oxygen levels of cells, while eliminating carbon dioxide through a hemoglobin substitute

• Rejuvenates the cell metabolism and refines skin’s surface structure significantly

• Relieves deep wrinkles and creases by reducing microcontractions

• Plumps skin from the inside out, restoring volume and elasticity

• Stimulates collagen production and sustainably strengthens fibroblastic structures

• Promotes skin’s own production of hyaluronan and increases ability to retain moisture

• Leaves exceptionally smooth, flawless and youthful skin

- 50 ml | 1.7 oz

- *These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease.

Ingredients

Liquid Surgery Complex (Perfluorocarbons), Meadowfoam Oil, Shea Butter, Pentavitin®, Hyaluronic Acid, Trylagen™, Tocopherol (Vitamin E), Ceramide III, Sea Mayweed, Syn®-Ake, Syn®-Hycan, CroNoline™, Cyclopeptide 5, Colloidal Gold, Golden Collagenine

Directions

Use mornings and evenings after preparing the skin. Apply Liquid Surgery Serum® by gently massaging it in. For optimal results, follow with creams of your choice.

An innovative combination of gentle and deep-pore cleansing components to start your incomparably Pure Perfection skin care ritual. After prolonged use, there is a noticeable refinement of the skin’s surface structure, while balancing the skin’s moisture.

entry.title: Hyaluron Mask
entry.summary:
Vendor: Medical Beauty Research
Type: face mask
Price: 320.00

Tip: Use Hyaluron Mask as an intensive beautifying 3-minute Booster before a special occasion.

entry.title: Beta Enzyme Treatment
entry.summary:
Vendor: Medical Beauty Research
Type: face mask
Price: 103.00

“The Key Preparation Treatment” 

An efficient skin care gel, based on mild hydroxy acids and a papain enzyme complex, which allows the skin to optimally absorb treatment products. Beta Enzyme removes excess sebum and lipids and therefore enables skin regeneration, revealing a radiant complexion. By stimulating the cell metabolism, the overall skin condition is improved. Minimizes fine lines, wrinkles and pores and revives dull skin. After prolonged use, there is a noticeable refinement of the skin’s surface structure as well as long-lasting moisturization.

• Removes excess sebum and lipids

• Increases ability to absorb treatment products

• Stimulates cell metabolism

• Activates regeneration process

• Minimizes fine lines, wrinkles and pores

• Refines skin’s surface structure

• Reveals smoothed and radiant skin

- 50 ml / 1.7 oz

- *These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease.

Ingredients

Active Ingredients: Alpha and Beta Hydroxy Acids, Peelmoist (Papain Enzyme Complex), Panthenol (Provitamin B5), Allantoin.

Directions

Use once a day, either morning or evening after cleansing. Apply Beta-Enzyme evenly to the entire face, including the eye area and lip contour if desired and allow to penetrate for 15 minutes. Rinse thoroughly several times with lukewarm water. For optimal results, follow with serum and creams of your choice. May cause tingling sensation. Avoid direct contact with eyes.
